H0.text: Drinking water after exercise allows the body to sleep for Tony, who always drinks water before and after his long bike rides, because his body needs water when he exercises.

H1.text: Drinking water after exercise helps to replace lost fluids for Tony, who always drinks water before and after his long bike rides, because his body needs water when he exercises.

H2.text: Drinking water before exercise helps increase the heart rate, which explains why Tony's body needs water when he exercises, as he always drinks water before and after his long bike rides.

H3.text: Drinking water before exercise prevents the body from sweating when Tony exercises during his long bike rides.

A4.text: Hydration system, an apparatus that helps its user drink enough liquid while engaged in physical activity

A5.text: Fluid replacement, the medical practice of replenishing bodily fluid
